ValidationRule.description: Controls that this field donÂ´t be empty when changing to Proforma Requested Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Community Connections", ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"Proforma Requested"), ISBLANK(Current_Video_Penetration_1__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Installation_Type__c, "Brownfield has full/partial FTR service"), ISPICKVAL(Installation_Type__c, "Expansion - Brownfield has full/partial FTR service") ) )
